scripts.initialize: yarn && cp api/.env.example api/.env && cp client/.env.example client/.env
scripts.clean: find . -name node_modules -type d -prune -o -name cache -type d -o -name dist -type d | xargs rm -rf
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn build:api && yarn build:client && mkdir dist && mv api/dist dist/api && mv client/dist dist/client
scripts.format:check: yarn workspace @gip-recia/tldraw-webcomponent format:check && yarn workspace @gip-recia/tldraw-api format:check
scripts.format: yarn workspace @gip-recia/tldraw-webcomponent format && yarn workspace @gip-recia/tldraw-api format
